p:
A9: Synthesis of ( E)-3-(4″-nitrophenyl)-1-[4′-(trifluoromethyl)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one: Yield: 61%; m.p. 82 °C; R
f = 0.7 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1654 (C=O), 1621 (C=C Ar), 1512 (CH=CH), 1252 (-CF 3), 3010 (Ar C-H stretching), 1430 (NO 2); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm): δ: 7.85 (1H, d, J = 17 Hz, -CO-CH=), 8.11 (1H, d, J = 16 Hz, Ar-CH=), 7.68–7.82 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 8.12–8.32 (4H, m, C-2″, 3″, 5″, 6″, Ar-H); ESI-MS: 322.11 [M + H] +.
